name: 4 Alternatives to Attending College
short_description: Peter Orszag recently wrote an article discussing the growing education gap between the rich and the poor. In the article, Orszag revealed that only 5 percent of kids from the lowest income quartile completed college. Compare that to the 36 percent of kids from the highest income quartile who graduated from college. The fact is, there are a ton of things you can do in lieu of going to college that don’t involve wasting your days away on the living room couch. Here are some alternatives to going to college.
